description: Allows for the immediate deduction of small value assets (costing <= RM 2,000) instead of claiming capital allowances.
advisoryText: Based on your profile, you may be able to claim a 100% deduction on small value assets (costing RM 2,000 or less). This can improve cash flow compared to claiming capital allowances over several years.

description: Provides an accelerated capital allowance for automation equipment and Industry 4.0 machinery to encourage digital transformation.
advisoryText: Based on your profile, you may be eligible for the Automation Capital Allowance (ACA). This allows a 200% accelerated deduction on the first RM 10 million of qualifying expenditure for automation and AI.

description: Provides a double deduction for remuneration paid to employees with disabilities (holding a Kad OKU).
advisoryText: Based on your profile, you may be eligible for a double deduction on the remuneration of employees who are registered as disabled (Kad OKU). This significantly reduces your company's taxable income.
